DOC.brief_summary: Determine whether concentration UCH-L1 GFAP measure umbilical cord blood blood 0-6 hour postnatal accurately predict extent neurodevelopmental deficit and/or death 18-20 month .
DOC.detailed_description: Children bear Hypoxic Ischemic Encephalopathy ( HIE ) already enrol IRB # 504-2011 see developmental follow-up 18-20 month age . The developmental assessment tool use call Bayley Scales Infant Toddler Development : 3rd Edition ( Bayley-III ) Screening Test . The result test compare child 's HIE biomarkers concentration already obtain birth .
DOC.criteria: child already enrol IRB # 5042011 1820 month age
